project_abstract.cdata: The project will support improvements in water supply, land development, environmental pollution control and traffic management and assist in setting a coherent urban planning and a two-phase programming framework.  The first phase will support improvements in water supply in the cities of Hangzhou, Ningbo and Wenzhou, land development in Shaoxing, environmental programs, institution building and traffic management in Hangzhou.  Water production will be increased by 620,000 cubic meters/day in three project cities.  More than 207 hectares of land area will be developed in Shaoxing to stem overcrowding and to provide expansion of industrial and commercial activities. The environmental programs consist of:  (a) a comprehensive liquid and solid waste management study, support to the provincial environmental agency and the detailed preparation of an environment project as a follow-up project; (b) a basic urban services upgrading component for the city of Ningbo; and (c) an environmental fund for pollution control investments to provide financial assistance to small- and medium-sized industrial enterprises.  The second phase will be a comprehensive environment project aimed at developing residential and industrial sewage collection and treatment systems, and improving on-site industrial wastewater treatment and nonsewered systems.

P003473.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>浙江城建项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将支持供水设施改造，土地开发、环境污染控制和交通管理，协助制定统一的城市规划和两期工程规划框架。一期工程将支持杭州、宁波和温州三市供水设施改造、绍兴市土地开发以及杭州市环境规划、机构建设和交通管理工作。三个项目市日产水量将增加62万立方米，绍兴市土地开发面积将达到207公顷以上，可缓解过度拥挤状况，为工商业活动提供更多用地。环境规划内容包括：（1）开展液体和固体废物综合管理研究，支持省级环保机构，详细准备一环境后续项目；（2）宁波市基本城市服务设施升级改造子项目；（3）设立环境基金，用于污染控制投资，向中小型工业企业提供资金援助。二期工程将是一项综合环境项目，其宗旨是建设生活污水和工业污水收集和处理系统，改造工业废水现场处理设施和非污水管网系统。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
